授業目的:
The objectives of this course are:
1. To help students acquire English presentation/discussion skills
2. To help students present their ideas clearly and effectively
3. To help students think independently and critically
4. To provide students with opportunities to give English presentations on various topics
5. To help students become better audience members
到達目標:
1. Students will develop speech-building strategies.
2. Students will acquire better communication skills.
3. Students will familiarize themselves with presentation/discussion techniques.
4. Students will become more confident public speakers.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ですので、60単位を超えて卒業に必要な単位として算入することができません（60単位までしか算入できない）。ただし、本授業科目が卒業に必要な単位として算入できない科目の場合は、たとえオンライン授業であっても“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”とはなりません。
The course is subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses and cannot be included as part of the credits required for graduation beyond 60 credits (only up to 60 credits can be counted). However, if the course is originally not credited toward graduation, it will not be determined as subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses, regardless of the online format.
授業方法:
1. This course will be conducted in English only and English will be the means of communication between the students and the instructor. (Students will also be expected to communicate with one another in English.)
2. Students are encouraged to actively participate in class discussions, both independently and collaboratively, in order to enhance their competence and confidence in English and also to create a better learning environment for all.

トピック.授業計画1: One to two hours of homework can be expected each week.
トピック.授業外学習2: One to two hours of homework can be expected each week.
